member.name: T:Unosquare.Labs.EmbedIO.IWebServer
member.summary:
Interface to create a WebServer class.
The basic behaviour for a WebServer is register/unregister modules and run asynchronous to receive incoming HTTP Requests.

member.name: P:Unosquare.Labs.EmbedIO.IWebServer.SessionModule
member.summary:
Gets registered SessionModule (if any).
SessionModule is an implementation of ISessionModule to handle session data.

member.name: P:Unosquare.Labs.EmbedIO.IWebServer.RoutingStrategy
member.summary:
Gets the URL RoutingStrategy used in this instance.
By default it is set to Wildcard, but Regex is the recommended value.

member.summary: Gets a list of registered modules.

member.summary: Gets or sets the on method not allowed.

member.summary: Gets or sets the on not found.

member.summary: Gets the module registered for the given type. Returns null if no module matches the given type.
member.returns: Module registered for the given type.

member.summary: Registers an instance of a web module. Only 1 instance per type is allowed.

member.summary: Unregisters the module identified by its type.

member.name: M:Unosquare.Labs.EmbedIO.IWebServer.RunAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Starts the listener and the registered modules.
member.param: The cancellation token; when cancelled, the server cancels all pending requests and stops.
member.returns: Returns the task that the HTTP listener is running inside of, so that it can be waited upon after it's been canceled.

member.name: T:Unosquare.Labs.EmbedIO.WebServer
member.summary:
Represents our tiny web server used to handle requests.
This is the default implementation of IWebServer and it's ready to select the IHttpListener implementation via the proper constructor.
By default, the WebServer will use the Regex RoutingStrategy for all registered modules (IWebModule) and EmbedIO Listener (HttpListenerMode).

member.name: M:Unosquare.Labs.EmbedIO.WebServer.#ctor
member.summary:
Initializes a new instance of the class.
Default settings are Regex RoutingStrategy, EmbedIO HttpListenerMode, and binding all network interfaces with HTTP protocol and default port (http://*:80/).

member.name: M:Unosquare.Labs.EmbedIO.WebServer.#ctor(System.Int32,Unosquare.Labs.EmbedIO.Constants.RoutingStrategy)
member.summary:
Initializes a new instance of the class.
Default settings are Regex RoutingStrategy, EmbedIO HttpListenerMode, and binding all network interfaces with HTTP protocol with the selected port (http://*:{port}/).

member.summary:

member.remarks: urlPrefix must be specified as something similar to: http://localhost:9696/ Please notice the ending slash. -- It is important.

member.name: T:Unosquare.Net.CloseStatusCode
member.summary: Indicates the status code for the WebSocket connection close.

remarks.para: The values of this enumeration are defined in Section 7.4 of RFC 6455.

"Reserved value" must not be set as a status code in a connection close frame by an endpoint. It's designated for use in applications expecting a status code to indicate that the connection was closed due to the system grounds.

member.name: F:Unosquare.Net.CloseStatusCode.Normal
member.summary: Equivalent to close status 1000. Indicates normal close.

member.name: F:Unosquare.Net.CloseStatusCode.Away
member.summary: Equivalent to close status 1001. Indicates that an endpoint is going away.

member.name: F:Unosquare.Net.CloseStatusCode.ProtocolError
member.summary: Equivalent to close status 1002. Indicates that an endpoint is terminating the connection due to a protocol error.

member.name: F:Unosquare.Net.CloseStatusCode.UnsupportedData
member.summary: Equivalent to close status 1003. Indicates that an endpoint is terminating the connection because it has received a type of data that it cannot accept.

member.name: F:Unosquare.Net.CloseStatusCode.Undefined
member.summary: Equivalent to close status 1004. Still undefined. A Reserved value.

member.name: F:Unosquare.Net.CloseStatusCode.NoStatus
member.summary: Equivalent to close status 1005. Indicates that no status code was actually present. A Reserved value.

member.name: F:Unosquare.Net.CloseStatusCode.Abnormal
member.summary: Equivalent to close status 1006. Indicates that the connection was closed abnormally. A Reserved value.

member.name: F:Unosquare.Net.CloseStatusCode.InvalidData
member.summary: Equivalent to close status 1007. Indicates that an endpoint is terminating the connection because it has received a message that contains data that isn't consistent with the type of the message.

member.name: F:Unosquare.Net.CloseStatusCode.PolicyViolation
member.summary: Equivalent to close status 1008. Indicates that an endpoint is terminating the connection because it has received a message that violates its policy.

member.name: F:Unosquare.Net.CloseStatusCode.TooBig
member.summary: Equivalent to close status 1009. Indicates that an endpoint is terminating the connection because it has received a message that is too big to process.

member.name: F:Unosquare.Net.CloseStatusCode.MandatoryExtension
member.summary: Equivalent to close status 1010. Indicates that a client is terminating the connection because it has expected the server to negotiate one or more extension, but the server didn't return them in the handshake response.

member.name: F:Unosquare.Net.CloseStatusCode.ServerError
member.summary: Equivalent to close status 1011. Indicates that a server is terminating the connection because it has encountered an unexpected condition that prevented it from fulfilling the request.

member.name: F:Unosquare.Net.CloseStatusCode.TlsHandshakeFailure
member.summary: Equivalent to close status 1015. Indicates that the connection was closed due to a failure to perform a TLS handshake. A Reserved value.

member.returns: A that represents this instance.

member.name: T:Unosquare.Net.WebSocketException
member.summary: The exception that is thrown when a gets a fatal error.

member.name: P:Unosquare.Net.WebSocketException.Code
member.summary: Gets the status code indicating the cause of the exception.
member.value: One of the enum values, represents the status code indicating the cause of the exception.

member.name: T:Unosquare.Net.Fin
member.summary: Indicates whether a WebSocket frame is the final frame of a message.
member.remarks: The values of this enumeration are defined in Section 5.2 of RFC 6455.

member.name: F:Unosquare.Net.Fin.More
member.summary: Equivalent to numeric value 0. Indicates more frames of a message follow.

member.name: F:Unosquare.Net.Fin.Final
member.summary: Equivalent to numeric value 1. Indicates the final frame of a message.

member.name: T:Unosquare.Net.Mask
member.summary: Indicates whether the payload data of a WebSocket frame is masked.
member.remarks: The values of this enumeration are defined in Section 5.2 of RFC 6455.

member.name: F:Unosquare.Net.Mask.Off
member.summary: Equivalent to numeric value 0. Indicates not masked.

member.name: F:Unosquare.Net.Mask.On
member.summary: Equivalent to numeric value 1. Indicates masked.

member.name: T:Unosquare.Net.Rsv
member.summary: Indicates whether each RSV (RSV1, RSV2, and RSV3) of a WebSocket frame is non-zero.
member.remarks: The values of this enumeration are defined in Section 5.2 of RFC 6455.

member.name: F:Unosquare.Net.Rsv.Off
member.summary: Equivalent to numeric value 0. Indicates zero.

member.name: F:Unosquare.Net.Rsv.On
member.summary: Equivalent to numeric value 1. Indicates non-zero.

member.name: T:Unosquare.Net.WebSocketReceiveResult
member.summary: Represents a WS Receive result.

member.name: T:Unosquare.Net.WebSocketState
member.summary: Indicates the state of a WebSocket connection.
member.remarks: The values of this enumeration are defined in The WebSocket API.

member.name: F:Unosquare.Net.WebSocketState.Connecting
member.summary: Equivalent to numeric value 0. Indicates that the connection hasn't yet been established.

member.name: F:Unosquare.Net.WebSocketState.Open
member.summary: Equivalent to numeric value 1. Indicates that the connection has been established, and the communication is possible.

member.name: F:Unosquare.Net.WebSocketState.Closing
member.summary: Equivalent to numeric value 2. Indicates that the connection is going through the closing handshake, or the WebSocket.Close method has been invoked.

member.name: F:Unosquare.Net.WebSocketState.Closed
member.summary: Equivalent to numeric value 3. Indicates that the connection has been closed or couldn't be established.
